name: Gal-Nin
description:
Play as a beautiful Gyaru Ninja and collect scrolls to learn the abilities needed to defeat the swarms of enemies. Throw your shuriken to target them with elemental attacks and find the right element to deal massive weakness damage. When you're satisfied you can find the key to escape this dungeon.

-- PS4 and Xbox  Controllers Recommended --

▢ - Attack

× - Dash

Δ - Throw Blade

L1 - Toggle Left Ninjutsu

R1 - Toggle Right Ninjutsu

-- Keyboard Controls --

F - Attack

Space - Dash

E - Throw Blade

L Ctrl - Toggle Left Ninjutsu

 Q - Toggle Right Ninjutsu

--CREDITS--

Menu Music - Spring

Battle Music - ISAo

Environment Art - Raoh's Dungeon Tileset

Inspired by FF7R's Yuffie and initially created for the GMTK 2021 jam, I over-scoped and ran out of time but didn't let that stop me from finishing the project over the week. With the theme being joined together and FF7RI's Ninjustu mechanic interesting me at the same time, I combined the two into a system where you can attach your shuriken to an enemy in order to target them at range to deal weakness damage with the right element. I created a small level with some enemies retooled from other projects to save time. Hopefully the mechanic is fun, feedback is greatly appreciated since I missed out on getting it from the jam.
